replies.txt_content:
niushao 发表于 2019-8-12 17:06
能告诉我是哪个mod的错误实体吗
https://www.mcmod.cn/class/1484.html

似乎是个半成品

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
试试 打开文件夹 .minecraft/config/ 中的文件 forge.cfg ，将
B:removeErroringEntities=false
B:removeErroringTileEntities=false复制代码
改为
B:removeErroringEntities=true
B:removeErroringTileEntities=true复制代码

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
-- Entity being ticked --
  Entity Type: ebwizardry:wizard (electroblob.wizardry.entity.living.EntityWizard)
  Entity ID: 19106
  Entity Name: 巫师
  Entity's Exact location: -172.50, 77.50, 67.50
  Entity's Block location: World: (-173,77,67), Chunk: (at 3,4,3 in -11,4; contains blocks -176,0,64 to -161,255,79), Region: (-1,0; contains chunks -32,0 to -1,31, blocks -512,0,0 to -1,255,511)
  Entity's Momentum: 0.00, -0.08, 0.00
首先打开forge的自动移除错误实体功能看看：
找到config\forge.cfg
然后把这两个参数后面的false改成true试试看
  B:removeErroringTileEntities=true

  B:fullBoundingBoxLadders=true

如果继续崩溃尝试使用NBTExplorer移除saves\新的世界\region下的r.-1.0.mca里面的[21,4]区块，来手动移除错误实体/方块
